dct_title_s: Trinidad / compiled & printed by Mapping & Control, Lands & Surveys Division, Ministry of Planning & Mobilization.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading. Panel title. On recto: distance chart  distances between districts. Verso includes index, chart of places of interest, road signs, tourist information, and color illustrations.
dct_creator_sm: Trinidad and Tobago. Lands and Surveys Division. Mapping & Control Section
dct_publisher_sm: Port of Spain, Trinidad : The Division, ©1990.
